thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com | 2 of 111
thread.title: Bennie H.
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Bennie H.

author: Bennie H.
title: Bennie H.
text: It was only a matter of hours before I was assigned to a appliance repairman. They scheduled a time to come out and kept their word. They assessed my problems, reported back to CHOICE HOME WARRANTY and within a few more days, I was good to go and my problems were resolved. I have had other home warranty service, but CHOICE is the best I have experienced. It's refreshing to find a company that keeps their word with no hidden clauses, fees, and disappointments.
